Getting Started

Introduction

The Enterprise Design System provides a comprehensive set of guidelines, components, and tools to help teams build consistent and high-quality digital experiences across all Enterprise platforms.

Installation

Install the Enterprise Design System using npm: 

npm install @Enterprise/design-system

Usage

Import and use components in your application: 

import { Button, Card } from '@Enterprise/design-system';
